about_the_game:
Bio Goddess: Doomsday Begins is a third-person shooter survival game in which players need to play as a female high school student to survive in a school where a biohazard occurs. The tasks in the game include exploring various scenes, finding resources, fighting enemies, and solving various puzzles to survive. And investigated the ins and outs of the incident, and discovered the relationship between the incident and his father, and his own life experience.

The game uses cute female character designs. Players can obtain different school uniforms during the game, and each school uniform has its own special skills. These include school uniforms from different countries, hoping to evoke memories of school life. There are sexy enemy shapes as well as scary monsters.

The game uses a third-person perspective, and players need to control the protagonist to survive in various scenes of the game. Collect various resources and upgrade weapons and character attributes (clothing). There are many puzzles to solve in the game, such as finding keys to open doors, cracking passwords, etc.

development Team

The game is developed solely by Leo. We hope this game will bring you a pleasant gaming experience. Thank you for your attention and support.

The game is still under development and not completed yet, please feel free to communicate with us and we will work together to make this game better!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content unsuitable for all audiences or for viewing in the workplace: some nudity content, graphic violence or gore, and general mature content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is expected to run at 1080p/30 FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 9600F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is expected to run at 1080p/60 FPS.

short_description: Bio Goddess: Doomsday Begins is a third-person shooter survival game where players assume the role of a female high school student surviving in a school struck by a biochemical crisis. They investigate the events, uncover their connection to their father, and explore their own identity.

English, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
